ocean.question: I have many shells, but I'm not a turtle. I live on the beach. What am I?

hints.text: 🏖️ You can build castles with me.
👣 I am under your feet at the beach.
🔬 I am made of tiny rocks and minerals.

ocean.question: I wave to you, but I have no hands. Boats sail on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am big and blue.
🐠 Fish live in me.
🚢 Ships travel on me.

ocean.question: I have a long body, sharp teeth, and swim in the ocean. People are afraid of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐟 I eat fish.
🦈 I am a type of fish.
🎬 You might see me in a scary movie.

ocean.question: I'm a home under the sea, made by tiny animals, colorful and branching. What am I?

hints.text: 🏘️ Many fish live in me.
🌈 I can be many colors.
🌿 I am made of lots of polyps.

ocean.question: I’m a very large sea animal that sings, but I'm not a singer. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I breathe air.
🌊 I live in the ocean, but I'm not a fish.
🎤 I make noises that sound like singing.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. Some say I'm very smart. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I have no bones.
🎨 I can change color.
🖐️ I use my arms to catch food.

ocean.question: I'm a current in the ocean that's warm and moves water far away. What am I called?

hints.text: 🌡️ I influence weather.
➡️ I move water across the ocean.
🇺🇸 My name is similar to something located near Florida.

ocean.question: I am the deepest part of the ocean. It is so deep that even light struggles to reach me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌑 It is very dark here.
📐 I'm a trench.
🗻 I am deeper than Mount Everest is tall.

ocean.question: I am a layer of the ocean where sunlight can reach, supporting lots of life. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I am the top layer.
🌱 Plants can grow here.
🐟 Most sea creatures live in me.

ocean.question: I am a very strong, dangerous swirling body of water. Boats try to avoid me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I spin around and around.
😵‍💫 I can pull things under the water.
🌀 I am often created by opposing currents.

plant.question: I am green and grow tall, with leaves and a trunk. Birds like to build their nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I give you shade on a sunny day.
🪵 Sometimes, people build houses out of me.
🍁 My leaves change color in the fall.

plant.question: I have petals and smell sweet. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I come in many different colors.
💐 People often give me as a gift.
🌻 I need sunshine and water to grow.

plant.question: I am long, green, and grow on a vine. I'm often used in salads and sandwiches. What am I?

hints.text: 🥒 I am crunchy and juicy.
🥪 You can pickle me and eat me later.
🥗 I am a type of vegetable.

plant.question: I am a root that is orange and crunchy. Rabbits love to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I grow underground.
👁️ People say I'm good for your eyesight.
🌱 I am a vegetable.

plant.question: I have sharp thorns and beautiful flowers, but you have to be careful when you pick me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I am often given as a sign of love.
🥀 I can be red, pink, white, or yellow.
🌿 I am a type of shrub.

plant.question: I am a plant that produces beans used to make a drink that many people enjoy in the morning. What am I?

hints.text: ☕ My beans are roasted before being used.
🌎 I am grown in warm places.
😴 I can help you wake up.

plant.question: I am a tall plant with big, yellow ears that you can eat. I am often popped and eaten at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I am a grain.
🍿 You can make popcorn from me.
🐔 Animals like to eat me too.

plant.question: I am a leafy herb that smells and tastes like licorice. I am often used in Italian cooking. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I am green and fragrant.
🍕 I am used to flavor pizza and pasta sauce.
🇮🇹 I am popular in Mediterranean cuisine.

plant.question: I am a very old, very tall type of tree that can live for thousands of years. Some people call me a 'living fossil'. What am I?

hints.text: 🌲 I'm a type of coniferous tree.
🏞️ You can find me in California.
⏳ I am one of the oldest living things on Earth.

plant.question: I am a plant whose leaves are used to make a drink that is popular in many Asian countries. What am I?

hints.text: 🍵 I am often served hot.
🇯🇵 I am very popular in Japan.
🍃 You steep my leaves in hot water.
